SELECT SEQ_STUDY.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO STUDY (STUDY_NO, STUDY_CLASS, STUDY_TITLE, STUDY_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO) VALUES (#{studyNo}, #{studyClass}, #{studyTitle}, #{studyContent}, #{memberNo})
mapper.select: SELECT S.STUDY_NO, S.STUDY_CLASS, S.STUDY_TITLE, S.STUDY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(S.STUDY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS STUDY_DATE, S.STUDY_VIEW, M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NAME FROM STUDY S, MEMBER M WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = S.MEMBER_NO AND STUDY_NO = #{studyNo}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, STUDY_NO, STUDY_CLASS, STUDY_TITLE, TO_CHAR(STUDY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS STUDY_DATE, STUDY_VIEW, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME FROM ( SELECT S.STUDY_NO, S.STUDY_CLASS, S.STUDY_TITLE, S.STUDY_DATE, S.STUDY_VIEW, M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NAME FROM STUDY S, MEMBER M WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = S.MEMBER_NO AND S.STUDY_NO > 0
ORDER BY S.STUDY_NO ASC)) WHERE RNUM >= 1 ORDER BY STUDY_NO DESC, STUDY_DATE DESC
